meanings.definition: A small piece or portion of something.
meanings.sent1: She only read a snippet of the book before falling asleep.
meanings.sent2: The article included a snippet of the interview with the author.
meanings.sent3: He found a snippet of a joke in the newspaper and chuckled.
meanings.sent4: The snippet of sunlight peeking through the clouds brightened her day.
meanings.sent5: The chef added a snippet of herbs to enhance the flavor of the dish.
